summary: This document is a brief email exchange from August 2019 regarding arranging travel to NYM, with the sender instructing someone to ensure travel is taken care of and the recipient acknowledging and working on information for the DAG (Deputy Attorney General).

persons.name: Boss
persons.context: The person who sent the initial email instructing that travel to NYM be arranged, effective immediately.

persons.name: DAG
persons.context: The recipient of information being prepared by the email responder, indicating legal or governmental involvement.

connections.description: The Boss is instructing preparation of information for the DAG, indicating a professional or reporting relationship.

events.title: Travel instruction issued
events.description: An instruction was sent to ensure someone takes care of travel to NYM, effective immediately.

keyFacts: An email exchange in August 2019 discusses arranging travel to NYM.
The instruction for travel was issued with immediate effect ('effective yesterday').
The responder is preparing information for the Deputy Attorney General (DAG), suggesting legal or investigative context.
